title: How to Enable TLS 1.3 in Mozilla Firefox

steps.headline: Update Firefox to the latest version available.
steps.description: Updating Firefox will also give you the latest security patches and fixes

steps.headline: In the address bar of Firefox, type about:config and hit ↵ Enter.
If presented with a warning, click or tap on I accept the risk!.
Type security.tls.version.max in the text box on the page.
steps.description: Do not type it in the address bar.

steps.headline: Right-click on security.tls.version.max and select Modify.
Replace the number in the text box with 4.
Restart Firefox.
steps.description: Close all tabs and windows and re-open Firefox.

text: Update Firefox to the latest version available. Updating Firefox will also give you the latest security patches and fixes In the address bar of Firefox, type about:config and hit ↵ Enter.  If presented with a warning, click or tap on I accept the risk!.  Type security.tls.version.max in the text box on the page. Do not type it in the address bar. Right-click on security.tls.version.max and select Modify.  Replace the number in the text box with 4.  Click or tap on OK.  Restart Firefox. Close all tabs and windows and re-open Firefox.
